translation.welcome_signin: Welcome back! Sign in to continue
translation.forgot_password_desc: Enter the email associated with your account, and we'll send you an email with instructions to reset your password.
translation.otp_desc: First, enter the code sent to your email address
translation.email_sent_desc: Please check your email for verification code
translation.password_complexity_invalid: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number and one special character
translation.identifier_required: Email address or username is required
translation.identifier_length_invalid: Email address or username must be between 4 and 50 characters
translation.password_length_invalid: Password must be between 8 and 50 characters
translation.email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address
translation.something_went_wrong: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
translation.incorrect_password: Password is incorrect. Try again, or use another method.
translation.username_length_invalid: Username must be between 4 and 30 characters
translation.username_special_chars_invalid: Username can only contain letters, numbers, underscores and periods
translation.too_many_requests: Too many requests. Please try again later.
translation.password_pwned: Your password is compromised. Choose a different one.
translation.welcome_signup_desc: We hope you enjoy your stay
translation.otp_signup_desc: Enter the code sent to your email address
translation.business_owner_desc: Setting up my account for my company.
translation.student_owner_desc: Looking to connect with other students.
